text: Sihamte bhabe ye, sanmilita bahini guci yoraa na'i. Yadi sanmilita bahini akau ahi parae, tetiya sihamte kamana karaiba ye, bhala haâ€™lehemtena yadi sihamte yayabara maraubasisakalara lagata thaki tomalokara sambada laba parailehemtena! Arau yadi sihamte tomalokara lagata arasthana karailehemtena tente nama matrahe yud'dha karailehemtena
